data: Event The district organizes numerous practical activities such as: Groundbreaking and inaugurating key projects and construction works: Nguyen Trai Park renovation and restoration project; Ha Dong Flower Garden improvement project; Ha Dong Secondary School construction project; Le Loi High School project groundbreaking; participation in the 1 st Book and Reading Culture Festival in 2024 with the theme “Books Open Worlds, Knowledge Opens Futures”… Located in the Southwest of Hanoi, Ha Dong is a land with a rich historical, cultural, and patriotic legacy, characterized by an unwavering revolutionary spirit. Throughout its 120-year journey of formation and development – experiencing 8 administrative restructurings, name changes, and boundary shifts – Ha Dong has consistently maintained its significance as the administrative center of Ha Dong, Ha Son Binh, and Ha Tay provinces before becoming a district of the Capital City. Name plaque installation of Nguyen Trai Park renovation project Marking 120 years since its establishment and 70 years since liberation, Ha Dong’s Party committee, government, and citizens remain proud of their glorious contributions to the national liberation struggle and country’s development. In 2024, Ha Dong District is organizing commemorative activities celebrating its 120th founding anniversary (December 6, 1904 – December 6, 2024) and 70 th Liberation Day (October 6, 1954 – October 6, 2024), coinciding with the 70 th Capital Liberation Day celebrations. Street and road name plaque installation across Ha Dong district. The district organizes numerous practical activities such as: Groundbreaking and inaugurating key projects and construction works: Nguyen Trai Park renovation and restoration project; Ha Dong Flower Garden improvement project; Ha Dong Secondary School construction project; Le Loi High School project groundbreaking; participation in the 1 st Book and Reading Culture Festival in 2024 with the theme “Books Open Worlds, Knowledge Opens Futures”. Collaborative documentary film production “Ha Dong 120 Years – Aspiration of Connection and Advancement”. Painting and photo exhibition commemorating Ha Dong’s 120 th founding anniversary. Painting and photo exhibition Organizing the 2024 Van Phuc Craft Village Cultural, Tourism, and Trade Week with the theme “Ha Dong Silk Homeland – Essence Converged”. Hosting the 1st Ha Dong District Young Talented Cultural Tourism and Craft Village Promoter Search Competition in 2024. Awarding the Creative Competition for “Silk Product Pattern and Motif Design” in Ha Dong district. Establishing Kim Dong Libraries in Phuc La and Ha Cau Wards. Organizing the Ao Dai Elegance Contest and Ha Dong Women’s Radiance Festival… Senior fitness and wellness gamesi Sports activities are vibrantly organized: 20th Family Badminton Tournament; Senior Fitness and Wellness Games; Trade Union Sports Festival; Youth Football Tournament; Cross-Country Running Competition; Club Table Tennis Championship; Senior Lightweight Volleyball Tournament… The district launches urban landscape enhancement operations, ensuring traffic safety and order; environmental sanitation; visual propaganda decoration; planting new flowers and ornamental plants to beautify the landscape. Organizing gratitude and recognition activities; visiting and gifting outstanding contributors… Drum performance welcoming the 2024 Van Phuc Craft Village Cultural, Tourism, and Trade Week. Through these activities, the district aims to promote, educate, and evoke profound pride in Ha Dong’s land and people. This is also an opportunity for Ha Dong district to introduce and showcase its economic, cultural, and tourism potential to domestic and international friends, particularly contributing to creating a ripple effect and promoting the cultural industry development of the Capital and the district./.
